name: Star Shower
description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
short_description: Fires six magic shooting stars that pursue the target.

data.Effect: Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes.

name: Comet
description: This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency.
short_description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
name: Starlight
description: Creates a small, floating star light that illuminates surroundings.This sorcery can be cast while in motion.
short_description: One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

data.Effect: Creates star light to illuminate surroundings

name: Lucidity
description: Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness.This sorcery can be cast while in motion.The Carian knights never waver.
short_description: One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

data.Effect: Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness

name: Night Shard
description: Swiftly fires a semi-invisible projectile. This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action.
short_description: One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

data.Effect: Swiftly fires a semi-invisible magic projectile

name: Roiling Magma
description: Fires a lump of condensed magma that explodes a short delay after hitting the target.
short_description: One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

data.Effect: Fires lump of magma that explodes after delay

name: Rykard's Rancor
description: The lord granted them an audience, whereupon they were welcomed by the maw of the great serpent.
short_description: The terrible power of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.

data.Effect: Releases searing spirits that repeatedly explode after delay

name: Frozen Armament
description: Enchants armament held in the right hand with frost.This sorcery can be cast while in motion.
short_description: Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
name: Heal
description: Heals HP for the caster and nearby allies.Hold to continue praying and delay activation.
short_description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.

data.Effect: Heals HP for you and nearby allies.

name: Darkness
description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the assassins of the Roundtable Hold.
short_description: Creates a veil of darkness that conceals the caster.

data.Effect: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster

name: Bloodboon
description: Thrust arm into the body of the Formless Mother, then scatter the bloodflame to set the area ablaze.
short_description: Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.

data.Effect: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.

name: Poison Armament
description: Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison. This incantation can be cast while in motion.
short_description: Incantation of the servants of rot.

data.Effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison.

name: Bestial Sling
description: It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
short_description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.

data.Effect: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards

name: Noble Presence
description: Once a sign of the gods' wrath, this incantation became a trophy of the Nobles' god hunt.
short_description: Ancient power of the Godskin Nobles.

data.Effect: Thrust out belly with gusto to unleash repelling shockwave

name: Frozen Lightning Spear
description: The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning.
short_description: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers.

data.Effect: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above
